scripts.clean: rm -rf generated/ dist/ docs/ full*.yml module-avigilon-alta-access.yml
scripts.sync-meta: VERSION=$(npm run -s get-version) NAME=$(yq e -oy .name package.json) DESC=$(yq e -oy .description package.json) yq e -i '.info.version=strenv(VERSION) | .info.title=strenv(NAME) | .info.description=strenv(DESC)' api.yml
scripts.generate:full: cp api.yml full.yml && if test -f connectionProfile.yml; then yq e -i '.components.schemas.ConnectionProfile.$ref'=\"./connectionProfile.yml\" full.yml; fi && if test -f connectionState.yml; then yq e -i '.components.schemas.ConnectionState.$ref'=\"./connectionState.yml\" full.yml; fi
scripts.generate:inflate: swagger-cli bundle -t yaml full.yml > full2.yml && mv full2.yml full.yml && cp full.yml module-avigilon-alta-access.yml
scripts.generate:api: hub-generator generate -g hub-module -i full.yml -o generated/ $(if test -f connectionProfile.yml; then echo -p isConnector=true;fi) $(if test -f connectionState.yml; then echo -p hasState=true;fi)
scripts.generate: npm run generate:full && npm run generate:inflate && npm run generate:api
scripts.build: npm run validate && npm run generate && npm run transpile
scripts.docs: npm run docs:redoc && npm run docs:api && npm run docs:combine
scripts.version: npm run sync-meta && git add api.yml
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:src
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run docs
scripts.postpublish: curl -i -u $NPM_USER:$WORKFLOW_DISPATCH_TOKEN -X POST -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" https://api.github.com/repos/auditlogic/module/actions/workflows/$WORKFLOW_ID/dispatches -d '{"ref":"master", "inputs":{"module":"access", "tag":"'$(yq e -oy .name package.json)@$(yq e -oy .version package.json)'", "message":"'"$MESSAGE"'"}}'
